subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Riccardo Ricco won his second mountaintop victory of the Tour de France the same day race favorite Cadel Evans had a fearsome fall. Monday, Bastille Day, riders will climb "beyond category."
snippet: Riccardo Ricco won his second mountaintop victory of the Tour de France the same day race favorite Cadel Evans had a fearsome fall. Monday, Bastille Day, riders will climb "beyond category."
